= Installation =

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Introduction =

We provide Debian and Ubuntu packages for the stable version of !InSight, along with the source code. This page helps you to decide how you can install !InSight on your system.

= Debian/Ubuntu =

If you are using a Debian-based Linux distribution such as Ubuntu, you may install the Debian packages of !InSight by follow the [InstallationOnDebian instructions for Debian].

= Building from Source =

If you use any other Linux distribution or want to try out the latest version from the source repository, read the description [BuildingFromSource how to compile InSight from source].
